entry.title: James commented on 'The Barrel Project'

link.title: We're fully open and are soon releasing house barreled beers. Come check us out again. It's a completely revamped look!...

entry.summary: We're fully open and are soon releasing house barreled beers. Come check us out again. It's a completely revamped look!...
entry.content: We're fully open and are soon releasing house barreled beers. Come check us out again. It's a completely revamped look! Opening hours: Wed-Fri: 4-11, Sat: 11-11, Sun: 12-7. Cheers!
